attributes.action: ensure a response to Ken Stringer is forthcoming regarding the "fair expenses" e-petition which has neither been accepted or rejected, just disappeared without a trace
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have emailed the e-petition team for clarification on what is happening and have not recieved a response

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
